I

increaseOrDecreaseChoice(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.ValidateInput
Returns true if the choice, expressed by the value of i, to increase or decrease the value of the die is correct.
increaseValue() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Die
Increases the value of the die by one.
initialize() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
When a new match starts: assigns a different private objective to each player, selects the public objectives for the game, creates the tool cards from a predefined file, sets the first draft and initializes the handler of rounds and turns.

isGameEnded() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.RoundHandler

isValid(int, int, Die) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.WindowPattern
Returns true if a certain die can be placed in a certain slot in the window pattern.
isValidFirstMove(int, int, Die) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.WindowPattern
Returns true if a certain die can be placed in a certain slot in the window pattern as the first positioning of the match.
isValidWithoutColors(int, int, Die) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.WindowPattern
Returns true if a certain die can be placed in a certain slot in the window pattern, ignoring all the color rules of the slot.
isValidWithoutValues(int, int, Die) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.WindowPattern
Returns true if a certain die can be placed in a certain slot in the window pattern, ignoring all the value rules of the slot.
